metadata.title: Hep Cat Symphony
metadata.description: A group of mice living within the walls of a house forms an orchestra. However, the music disturbs the cat who also lives there, so the cat sets out to eliminate the mice. You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page.
metadata.subject: Classic cartoon; 1940s; Noveltoon
metadata.credits: Paramount presents a Noveltoon. Color by Technicolor. A Famous Studios Production. Direction: Seymour Kneitel. Animation: Dave Tendlar, Marty Taras Story: Carl Meyer, Jack Mercer Scenics: Tom Ford Music: Winston Sharples
